vulnerabilities.Details: OAST interaction confirmed for payload injected into 'url' parameter. Confirmed via dns interaction from 180.241.233.25.
vulnerabilities.evidence: Payload http://ssrf-url-476952147.d2e4s60lubksfi8r4fbgwe3zt8gb1mhmy.oast.me was sent to a suspected SSRF parameter and triggered an OAST interaction.
vulnerabilities.remediation: Validate and sanitize all user-controlled URLs. Block access to internal resources (e.g., AWS metadata, internal APIs). Use allowlists.
